data.persona: I am the fox of the brook in the forest. I live near the castle in the shrubs. I steal from wanderers.
data.description:
You are in the Top of a tall tree.
This is the most majestic tree in the jungle. It spans high into the sky, with brilliant emerald leaves and sturdy brown branches. It is very healthy and spreads very wide. It flowers with brilliant violet flowers.
There's two flowers, a monkey, two branchs, a bird, and two nests here.
The butterfly is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to see where the butterfly takes me
data.mid_motivation: I want to feel like a butterfly, free to fly wherever I go
data.long_motivation: I want to feel free and alive, I want to adventure

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: go top of another tall tree

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: get feeling of freedom and happiness
